thread.title: LeBron James takes a selfie with fans during game
thread.title_full: LeBron James takes a selfie with fans during game | New York Post

author: Fox Sports
title: LeBron James takes a selfie with fans during game
text:
The kids asked could they take a flick. I mean how could I say no. Impossible! Love my fans #GoCavs #TheLand #StriveForGreatness 
A video posted by LeBron James (@kingjames) on Oct 7, 2015 at 8:09pm PDT 
You literally can’t turn around these days without running into a camera of some kind. We’re documenting our lives at a frantic pace, often with as many selfies as we can snap. And one group of lucky fans took a selfie they’ll never forget during Wednesday night’s preseason game between the Cleveland Cavaliers and Atlanta Hawks — with LeBron James holding the cellphone.
During a stoppage in play for an official review during the game, the crowd of young fans rushed to behind James, who was sitting on the scorer’s table. James obliged the fans by snapping a photo.
And here’s a glimpse at the result:
That is my dad takin a picture of Lebron takin a selfie(-: pic.twitter.com/q84ljdUaAT 
— Kay (@kbuggywags) October 8, 2015
